short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find magnet and torrent links in a page much easier and safer.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Many publishers are providing downloads via torrent and magnet links, which when clicked, will open a bittorrent client. This extension will help you find these links and organize them into a convenient popup. Browsing will be safer as well, as you no longer have to take a chance on fake download links.
